item.description: Our second meeting to practice Italian. With 15 people, the first meeting was a success. A number of people said they thought once a month is not enough. Since I am not in town on the 21st, I'm scheduling the second meeting for the Monday after. Si Vediamo.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano
